pydicom_version.description: The version of pydicom where the bug is present.

team_name.prompt: Generate a plausible name for a core development team in an open-source medical software project. Examples: 'Core Utilities Team', 'DICOM Standards Group', 'IO & Parsing Squad'. Return only the team name.

project_name.prompt: Generate a formal name for this internal bug fix task. Examples: 'Q3-Codify-Refinement', 'Task-1674-SeqGen-Fix', 'DICOM-IO-Patch-2.3.1'. Return only the name.
